natural solution: The greatest common factor of $37a^2$ and $111a$ is $37a$.
We factor $37a$ out of both terms to get\begin{align} 37a^2 + 111a &= 37a \cdot a+ 37a \cdot 3\\ &=\boxed{37a(a+3)} \end{align}
